title: Create Alfred workflow to run RecipeRipper from a URL
description:
Alfred workflow where you paste a URL and it runs the recipe extraction pipeline.

## Sample command

```bash
source /Users/tim/workspace/personal/RecipeRipper/.venv/bin/activate && python recipe_extractor.py --youtube "https://youtube.com/shorts/JfrsYvGV7d8?si=ItMIfmS_Jj1XSRJq" --outdir output_test --cleanup --max-frames 30 --publish --paprika
```

## Requirements
- Must source the venv before running the command
- Accept a YouTube URL as input (passed from Alfred)
- Run the full extraction pipeline with `--cleanup --max-frames 30 --publish --paprika`
